articles.author: Henry Valantine
articles.title: Christian Horner holds meeting with Max Verstappen's manager in Dubai - Planet F1
articles.description: Following a difficult weekend off track, Christian Horner and senior Red Bull figures have met with Max Verstappen's management in Dubai.
articles.content:
Red Bull team principal Christian Horner has met with Max Verstappen’s management for face-to-face talks following a Bahrain Grand Prix where he has dominated off-track conversation.
